  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:ait.opetaja.ee:39aeeeb6ba75d4b992e21ba1fd30df76cc00bdd1</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>1</catalog>
            <entry>39aeeeb6ba75d4b992e21ba1fd30df76cc00bdd1</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="et">Leia liitsõna!</string>
            <string language="en">Find a compound word</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Finden Sie ein zusammengesetztes Wort</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Trouvez un mot composé</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Encontre uma palavra composta</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Trovi una parola composta</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Βρείτε μια σύνθετη λέξη</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Encuentre una palabra compuesta</string>
          </title>
          <language>et</language>
          <description>
            <string language="et">Sihtrühm: 5-6-aastased lapsed ja 1.- 2. klassi õpilased. PowerPoint esitlus - õppemäng sõnavara rikastamiseks, lugemis- ja kirjutamisoskuse arendamiseks, liitsõnade leidmiseks.</string>
            <string language="en">Target group: 5-6 year old children and students of forms 1 and 2. PowerPoint presentation- a game for enlargement vocabulary, developing reading and writing skills, finding compound words.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="et">Alusharidus</string>
            <string language="et">Keel ja kõne</string>
            <string language="et">Lugema ja kirjutama õppimine</string>
            <string language="en">Basic Education</string>
            <string language="en">Language and talking</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zielgruppe: 5-6 Einjahreskinder und 
Kursteilnehmer Formulare 1 und 2. PowerPoint Darstellung ein 
Spiel für den Vergrößerung Wortschatz, sich entwickelnden Messwert 
und Schreiben Fähigkeiten, zusammengesetzte Wörter finden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Groupe cible : vieux enfants de 5-6 ans et 
étudiants des formes 1 et 2. Présentation de PowerPoint un jeu
pour le vocabulaire d'agrandissement, la lecture se développante et 
les qualifications d'écriture, trouvant des mots composés.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Grupo de alvo: crianças de 5-6 anos e 
estudantes velhos dos formulários 1 e 2. Apresentação de 
PowerPoint um jogo para o vocabulário da ampliação, a leitura 
tornando-se e as habilidades da escrita, encontrando palavras 
compostas.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Gruppo di obiettivo: i bambini di 5-6 anni 
ed allievi delle forme 1 e 2. Presentazione del PowerPoint un 
gioco per vocabolario dell'ingrandimento, lettura di sviluppo ed 
abilità di scrittura, trovanti le parole composte.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ομάδα-στόχος: ηλικίας παιδιά 5-6 ετών και 
σπουδαστές μορφών 1 και 2. παρουσίαση PowerPoint - ένα 
παιχνίδι για το λεξιλόγιο διεύρυνσης, που αναπτύσσουν την 
ανάγνωση και που γράφουν τις δεξιότητες, που βρίσκουν τις 
σύνθετες λέξεις.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Grupo de blanco: viejos niños de 5-6 años
y estudiantes de las formas 1 y 2. Presentación de PowerPoint 
un juego para el vocabulario de la ampliación, la lectura que se 
convierte y las habilidades de la escritura, encontrando palabras 
compuestas.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Grundlegende Ausbildung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sprache und Unterhaltung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Éducation de base</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Langage et parler</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Instrução Básica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Língua e falar</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Formazione Di base</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Linguaggio e comunicare</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Βασική εκπαίδευση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Γλώσσα και ομιλία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Educación Básica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Lenguaje y el hablar</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
